title: Shadow Creatures
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                 |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Creates replicas of creatures native to the caster's current location, weaving them from shadows and threads of Abyssal matter. |

**Shadow Creatures** is a [Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings") spell with context-sensitive results. It summons `1d(1 + HD/5)` monsters or groups fitting to the area that you are in. The duration of the summoned creatures is inversely dependent on their [hit dice](/Hit_dice "Hit dice"), so weaker creatures will last longer. Monsters normally generated with equipment are given summoned versions of their weapons and armour which disappear with them.

Summoned bands (such as a group of orcs) only count as one creature in regards to the summoning cap of 4.

The following enemies cast Shadow Creatures:

- g [![Boggart.png](/images/e/e6/Boggart.png)](/File:Boggart.png) **[Boggart](/Boggart "Boggart")**
- G [![Glowing orange brain.png](/images/3/39/Glowing_orange_brain.png)](/File:Glowing_orange_brain.png) **[Glowing orange brain](/Glowing_orange_brain "Glowing orange brain")**
- L [![Halazid warlock.png](/images/d/d2/Halazid_warlock.png)](/File:Halazid_warlock.png) **[Halazid warlock](/Halazid_warlock "Halazid warlock")**
- 8 [![Orange crystal statue.png](/images/1/12/Orange_crystal_statue.png)](/File:Orange_crystal_statue.png) **[Orange crystal statue](/Orange_crystal_statue "Orange crystal statue")**
- 2 [![Shadow demon.png](/images/a/a8/Shadow_demon.png)](/File:Shadow_demon.png) **[Shadow demon](/Shadow_demon "Shadow demon")**
- 8 [![Strange machine.png](/images/3/35/Strange_machine.png)](/File:Strange_machine.png) **[Strange machine](/Strange_machine "Strange machine")**

## History

| [![Shadow creatures.png](/images/1/19/Shadow_creatures.png)](/File:Shadow_creatures.png) Shadow Creatures |                                                                                                                       |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                                     | 6                                                                                                                     |
| School1                                                                                                   | [Summoning](/Summonings "Summonings")                                                                                 |
| Source(s)                                                                                                 | - [Book of Dreams](/Book_of_Dreams "Book of Dreams")
- [Book of Summonings](/Book_of_Summonings "Book of Summonings") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                               | 4                                                                                                                     |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                 | 0                                                                                                                     |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Creates replicas of creatures native to the caster's current location, weaving them from shadows and threads of Abyssal matter. You can sustain at most four creatures summoned by this spell. |

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), this spell was a level 6 [Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings") spell available to players. Players can still invoke this spell via a [scroll of summoning](/Scroll_of_summoning "Scroll of summoning").
- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), [pandemonium lords](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord") could cast this spell.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), Shadow Creatures was level 5.
- Prior to [0.12](/0.12 "0.12") this spell was considered [unholy](/Unholy "Unholy").
- In 0.10, the duration of Shadow Creatures summons was reduced.
html:
Shadow Creatures

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Creates replicas of creatures native to the caster's current location, weaving them from shadows and threads of Abyssal matter.

Shadow Creatures is a Summonings spell with context-sensitive results. It summons 1d(1 + HD/5) monsters or groups fitting to the area that you are in. The duration of the summoned creatures is inversely dependent on their hit dice, so weaker creatures will last longer. Monsters normally generated with equipment are given summoned versions of their weapons and armour which disappear with them.

Summoned bands (such as a group of orcs) only count as one creature in regards to the summoning cap of 4.

The following enemies cast Shadow Creatures:

  • g Boggart
  • G Glowing orange brain
  • L Halazid warlock
  • 8 Orange crystal statue
  • 2 Shadow demon
  • 8 Strange machine

History

 Shadow Creatures
Level 6
School1 Summoning
Source(s)
  • Book of Dreams
  • Book of Summonings
Casting noise 4
Spell noise 0
Creates replicas of creatures native to the caster's current location, weaving them from shadows and threads of Abyssal matter. You can sustain at most four creatures summoned by this spell.
  • Prior to 0.28, this spell was a level 6 Summonings spell available to players. Players can still invoke this spell via a scroll of summoning.
  • Prior to 0.26, pandemonium lords could cast this spell.
  • Prior to 0.18, Shadow Creatures was level 5.
  • Prior to 0.12 this spell was considered unholy.
  • In 0.10, the duration of Shadow Creatures summons was reduced.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Shadow_Creatures&oldid=60899"

The duration of the summoned creatures is inversely dependent on their [[hit dice]], so weaker creatures will last longer. Monsters normally generated with equipment are given summoned versions of their weapons and armour which disappear with them.
